data.communities:
perl4lib mailing list (http://www.rice.edu/perl4lib) and
    http://marcpm.sf.net/ is our CVS repository.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
MARC::Record is the replacement for the all-but-abandoned MARC.pm
    module. The distro also includes MARC::Lint for checking field and
    subfield conformance, and also a few utilities like marcdump for
    dumping MARC files.
